title: Godavari
creator_credit: R.S. Junnerker, Jehangir Bhownagary and Documentary Films of India
brief_description: A description of the River Godavari which flows from the hills east of Bombay across northern India to the Bay of Bengal. Includes an account of various temples, shrines, towns and villages built at its source and along its banks.
creator_credit_for_label: R.S. Junnerker, Jehangir Bhownagary and Documentary Films of India
